title: Ellen DeGeneres Tells Brad Pitt She Hooked Up With One Of His Exes, People Go Nuts Guessing Which One
text:
Brad Pitt and Ellen DeGeneres have way more in common than just being hugely rich mega-stars, they actually share an ex-girlfriend.

The talk show host made the revelation while interviewing the 'Ad Astra' star during a taping airing later today.

According to Pitt, the two celebrities met at a Melissa Etheridge pool party in the late '80s or early '90s.

But during the discussion Pitt dropped the greatest bombshell, saying DeGeneres was actually hitting on his then-girlfriend. "I was flattered," he said.

That's when Ellen made it seem like she actually dated another one of Brad's former girlfriends. "We'll talk about that later," she chuckled.

"After the show," Pitt responded.

The problem is neither of them admitted in front of the live studio audience anything about the young lady, not even initials, nothing.

As we all know, Pitt was married to Angelina Jolie for many years until their divorce in 2016. The ex-couple shares six children: Shiloh, Pax, Maddox, Zahara, Knox and Vivienne.

Ellen is married to Portia De Rossi and has been with the actress for many years.

View photos

So let the guessing begin, Anne Heche, Jennifer Aniston, Gwyneth Paltrow, Alexandra Hedison?

We are going to go with Angelina Jolie, just because its Friday and this is fun.

Check out Brad on the 'Ellen DeGeneres Show' and see if you can figure it out.
